quote: As long as poverty, injustice and gross inequality persist in our world, none of us can truly rest.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: When you help the poor, you help the whole economy grow. Charity is not a solution. We need to empower.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: Hunger is not an issue of charity. It is an issue of justice.
author: Jacques Diouf

quote: If you canâ€™t feed a hundred people, then feed just one.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: There are people in the world so hungry, that God cannot appear to them except in the form of bread.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Sharing food with another human being is an intimate act that should not be indulged in lightly.
author: M.F.K. Fisher

quote: We know that a peaceful world cannot long exist, one-third rich and two-thirds hungry.
author: Jimmy Carter
